name: Pirate King: New World
description:
Youth! Passion! Fantasy! Find them all in 【Pirate King: New World】! Remember the moment that made you want to cry or want to fight? Enies Lobby, Marineford, Dressrosa… here they are. Call your nakamas, set sail, to the land of dreams!

==Set sail to find your inner passion==
Relive all the moving stories, call your nakamas to another voyage. Impel Down, Monster Challenge, Long Ring Long Land, Docks… amazing gameplays offer amazing rewards!

==All-out war for the ultimate treasures==
On the Grand Line, you’re bound to encounter tough rivals. No more one-on-one duels, settle the score with an awesome 8v8 battle! 4 Assist spots give your infinite possibilities. Every character is useful on the seas!

==Namakas, see you in the Guild Dungeons!==
Nakamas! Assemble on the Going Merry! When Guild Dungeons come calling, call the friends who fought alongside you, and make new friends along the way—no crew is too big for the New World! The clash of Guild is about the begin, are you ready?

==Infinite gameplays, boundless fun==
Come and have fun in the many arena battles beyond the campaign stages; upgrade ships to join sea battles; character bios refresh the classic Manga moments; scramble for fruits on Long Ring Long Land; and rescue missions at Impel Down…
